Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Military/War
Status: New Series
Network: BBC THREE ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Tuesdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: June 07, 2011

Our War takes a unique insight into the war in Afghanistan told through a seriesof films made by the soldiers serving there themselves.

(http://www.tvrage.com/Our_War)
